column1: # Use these standardized values for data validation
1. Each regimen must have a unique Regimen_ID
2. Use the Reference_Data sheet for standardized dropdown values
3. All required fields must be completed
5. Use semicolons to separate multiple values in single cells
- Link drugs to regimens using Regimen_ID
- Include all drugs in the regimen
- Specify day of administration for multi-day cycles
- Numeric fields must contain valid numbers
- Use only approved values from Reference_Data
1. Complete all sheets with your regimen data
